category: Herbs that Transform Phlegm and Stop Coughing Emetic Herbs

indications: Windstroke, seizures, epilepsy and painful obstruction of the throat due to a welling up of Phlegm
Ingestion of poisons and toxic substances (take immediately)
Topically for scabies, tinea, fungus and lice

contraindications: This herb is extremely toxic. Use only when absolutely necessary and then with great caution.
Do not use for the debilitated.
Do not use for those who have lost Blood.

Incompatible with Rx. Paeoniae Alba #{BaiShao} Bai Shao.
Incompatible with Rx. Paeoniae Rubra #{ChiShao} Chi Shao.
Incompatible with Rx. Ginseng #{RenShen} Ren Shen.
Incompatible with Rx. Codonopsis #{DangShen} Dang Shen.
Incompatible with Rx. Glehniae/Adenophorae #{ShaShen} Sha Shen.
Incompatible with Rx. Scrophulariae #{XuanShen} Xuan Shen.
Incompatible with Rx. Sophorae Flavescentis #{KuShen} Ku Shen.

useCases: Wind-Phlegm welling up to obstruct the orifices (powder both herbs and take with warm water)
Loss of consciousness due to clogging of Phlegm
